Uses of Class
util.Answer

  • Packages that use Answer 
    Package Description
    controller
    Provides the classes necessary to control the conversation between the InfoBot and the user, through facilitating among multiple InfoBot classes.
    knowledge
    Provides the classes necessary to store all the knowledge for answering questions for the entire InfoBot program.
    util
    Provides the Answer class to hold the answers to the user's questions and related information.

    • Uses of Answer in controller

      Fields in controller with type parameters of type Answer 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) ArrayList<Answer> Stage.answers  
      Methods in controller that return Answer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract Answer BaseController.getInfo​(String question)
      returns the answer that matches the question from the user
      Answer MultiDialogueController.getInfo​(String question)
      This is the method used to manage the conversation between the InfoBot and a user.
      Method parameters in controller with type arguments of type Answer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void MultiDialogueController.rankAnswers​(ArrayList<Answer> answers)
      This method ranks the answers to the user's question based upon the number of key words matched, from the most to the least.

    • Uses of Answer in knowledge

      Methods in knowledge that return types with arguments of type Answer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ArrayList<Answer> KnowledgeBase.getAnswers​(ArrayList<String> intent)
      This method gets a list of answers based upon the user's intent
      ArrayList<Answer> LocalKBMultiples.getAnswers​(ArrayList<String> intents)
      This method checks if there is a match for the key words from the user's question.

    • Uses of Answer in util

      Methods in util with parameters of type Answer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int Answer.compareTo​(Answer another)
      Implement the compareTo method for the Comparable interface.
